00476 // ========================================================================
00477 //                                      Implementation of inlined methods =

00479 
00480 inline uint32 
00481 GMSCountryOverviewMap::getOverviewIDFast(uint32 origMapID, 
00482                                          uint32 origItemID)
00483 {
00484    originalIDs_t origID;
00485    origID.origMapID = origMapID;
00486    origID.origItemID = origItemID;
00487    
00488    map<struct originalIDs_t, uint32>::iterator p = 
00489       m_idsByOriginalIDs.find( origID );
00490    if ( p != m_idsByOriginalIDs.end() ) {
00491       return p->second;
00492    } else {
00493       return MAX_UINT32;
00494    }
00495 }
